H0.text: Aluminum is the most abundant metal in the Earth's crust.

H1.text: Calcium is the most abundant metal of the earth's crust.

H2.text: Copper is the most abundant metal of the earth's crust.

H3.text: Magnetite is the most abundant metal of the Earth's crust.

A4.text: In the Earth's crust, aluminium is the most abundant metallic element (8.23% by mass)

A5.text: A large number of silicates in the Earth's crust contain aluminium
